text: Porutham is a 1993 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Kaladharan, starring Murali,Siddique (actor) and Sreelekshmi. ==Cast== * Murali as Adv. Nandakumar * Siddique as Chandrabhanu * Sreelekshmi as Aathira (Nandakumar's wife) * Jagathy Sreekumar as Unnithan (Nandakumar's friend) * Kaveri as Asha (Athira's sister) * Jose Pallissery as Shivashankaran * T. R. Omana as Bhavani (Nandakumar's mother) * Harisree Ashokan as Gulumal Jamal * Janardanan as Gopinathan (Athira's father) * Kalpana as Vasanthakokila (Unnithan's wife) * Mohanraj * Zeenath as Gopinanthan's wife and Athira,Asha's mother * Vijayaraghavan as Police Officer * Neena Kurup as Hema, Aathira's friend * Renuka (Prashanthi) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Porutham
